txt.en: 'You return in victory, [placeholder]! I am pleased to see that you bring with you the hide of Zorrgolug and helmets of the Tarkrîp tinged with brimstone. The tale of your deeds grows ever longer!\n\n'There are more components to seek, [placeholder]. Next I will need the glossy hides of cave-claws and the horns of the Neekerbreekers that dwell in Angmar and other such evil places.'
'You do not have the first set of components I asked for, [placeholder]? How can this be?'
Articles of Discovery

'I welcome you once again, [placeholder], for I see that you have returned with the glossy skins and corroded horns I tasked you with obtaining.

'The last set of components remains, and obtaining these will not be easy. Do not despair! I am confident that you can retrieve them, even from the blackest depths of the shadow itself!

'I need now a Rune of Winged Dominance, borne by the merrevail Mormoz and Azgoth at Carn Dûm, and an Insignia of Battle, carried by Sorkrank and Burzfîl at Urugarth.'
'You have not returned with the second set of components for which I asked, [placeholder].'
Collected Zorrgolug's matted hide
'You may find the Warg Zorrgolug prowling in Fasach-falroid in Angmar. The Tarkrîp goblins may also be found in Angmar, but dwelling among the Orc-camps of Malenhad.'

'You emerge triumphant from the darkness, [placeholder], and I rejoice to see it!\n\n'I marvel at your hunting prowess, my friend. Wear this small token with pride, for you have earned it with your hard work and your dedication!'
Collected brimstone-tinged Tarkrîp-helmets ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'As I have told you, you may find both cave-claws and nerbeglir in Angmar and other evil places.'
'You have not brought me the components for which I asked, [placeholder].'
Collected glossy cave-claw skins ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

Zorrgolug prowls in Fasach-falroid in Angmar. Tarkrîp goblins dwell among the Orc-camps of Malenhad in Angmar.\n\nFenton Marshley asked you to bring him the matted hide of the Warg Zorrgolug and brimstone-tinged Tarkrîp helmets.
'You may find Mormoz and Azgoth at Carn Dûm, while Sorkrank and Burzfîl serve at Urugarth.'
Collected corroded Neekerbreeker-horns ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collect Insignia of Battle
Fenton Marshley is at the Hunting Lodge east of Archet and north of Bree, in Bree-land.\n\nYou have collected the first set of components Fenton Marshley asked you to bring him.
Collected Rune of Winged Dominance
Bring last set of components to Fenton Marshley
Cave-claws and nerbeglir dwell in Angmar and other such evil places.\n\nFenton Marshley asked you to bring him glossy cave-claw skins and corroded Neekerbreeker-horns.
Collected Insignia of Battle
Collect Rune of Winged Dominance
Fenton Marshley is at the Hunting Lodge east of Archet and north of Bree, in Bree-land.\n\nYou have collected the second set of components Fenton Marshley asked you to bring him.
Collect Insignia of Battle
Mormoz and Azgoth may be found at Carn Dûm in Angmar. Sorkrank and Burzfîl serve at Urugarth.\n\nFenton asked you to bring him a Rune of Winged Dominance and an Insignia of Battle.
Fenton Marshley is at the Hunting Lodge east of Archet and north of Bree, in Bree-land.\n\nYou have collected the final set of components Fenton Marshley asked you to bring him.
Collect Zorrgolug's matted hide
Collect brimstone-tinged Tarkrîp-helmets ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Bring the first set of components to Fenton Marshley
Collect glossy cave-claw skins ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collect corroded Neekerbreeker-horns ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Bring second set of components to Fenton Marshley
Collect glossy cave-claw skins ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collect corroded Neekerbreeker-horns ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collect Rune of Winged Dominance
Fenton Marshley has agreed to help you fashion a piece of equipment worthy of your great skill as a hunter.

'I can make you a piece of equipment worthy of your skill as a hunter, [placeholder], but with this offer I give to you a warning: the tale of this piece will be hard-fought and purchased with great toil.\n\n'I will need time between each stage of the process, so do not bring me everything at once. I will first need the matted hide of Zorrgolug, a great Warg of Fasach-falroid, and five brimstone-tinged Tarkrîp helmets affected by the great swamp of Malenhad. Begin your hunt with confidence and finish it with triumph!'
